title: Enie9
author: Enie9
content: in cash game in the results which I prove to be unfair....https://bc.game/#/sd/119TR4H1ZSQGPFhttps://bc.game/#/sd/119TQGAXD1N6S3https://bcgame-project.github.io/verify/crash.html?hash=0c065eb8e485a263556f3ee64a95209d6940b0685da9b6d08d75225145360672&v=https://bcgame-project.github.io/verify/crash.html?hash=fface782baf6f305268f4aa99a4b04e3969f00abf39d51baa03a05d6ca6c4bad&v=I have pictures, but I'm not good at posting them. If in doubt, I can send them for private viewing....

comments.author: John Abraham
comments.body: OP, Can you please write in detail? I don't see anything suspicious. You just posted two bet IDs; I've checked those are lost bets. What else do you have to prove your claims? The verification says the game result should be 1.04x and 1.82x. I am curious what was your target bet on those specific rounds? I don't know how their crash game works! So, explaining the details would help others to understand why you think the results are unfair. I want to ask, did you contact their support and ask if they have any explanation about it? BC Games is well known, established online casino. They are unlikely to ruin their reputation bu tempering the games. However, anything could happen in online. Did you contact them within the forum or outside of the forum? If you did not knock them yet, Consider sending them a PM to this account https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=2503677 and let them know about existence of this topic.

comments.author: Enie9
comments.body: yes the result is under×2 in cash game i play it is a cash game bet between under×2 or over×2 i bet under×2 but i am wrong what do you mean?And now they have changed the result to more than ×2, which means  They can definitely change the outcome.You can click on verify in link me https://bc.game/#/sd/119TQGAXD1N6S3 and you will see that they fixed the result to 3.27.

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Quote from: Enie9 on May 17, 2023, 10:09:56 AMI have pictures, but I'm not good at posting them. If in doubt, I can send them for private viewing....Your rank does not allow display of images. You can take a screenshot and upload the images in a third party image hosting sites like https://imgbb.com or https://talkimg.com and then share the link in the forum for the members to seeWhen making a scam accusation, try as much as possible to include all the necessary evidence to avoid any doubts from members.

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Try to list your problem about them, what you did and what they have done to you as well. Your post is not clear, so we can't identify what are the issues. Try to make screenshots and use the sites for image uploading mentioned above. Make sure that you wont include confidential details such as email, etc.

comments.author: 348Judah
comments.body: Some people can always give flimsy excuses just to ebsure that they report about something even though the fault is coming from them, as long as they are not seing the required result needed or as expected by them, they try to lay such accusation, same thing can be seen on this scam accusation board whereby you see members reporting without giving full and detailed explanation of how it all occurred, not to talk of the evidence that serves as proof, we can sometimes put ouese in their shoes to often get reported in what we do despite how we are trying to deliver the best to the people, we get the opposite in response, scam is not what should be allowed but our fact must be on a good ground as well when reporting one.

comments.author: GxSTxV
comments.body: Quote from: Enie9 on May 19, 2023, 04:51:27 AMSnipIm not sure why or how BC casino would engage in editing or cheating on such games and system. This is the first time I have seen someone accuse a casino of manipulating the seed and hash also known as the Secure Hash Algorithm if possible in first place. Everything appears normal to me from what you shared in the OP except for the screenshots you shared now which differs from what is currently visible on the GitHub script.It will be difficult for anyone to believe your accusation without actual evidence. It would be more convincing if you could provide an archived version of the link using [1] instead of relying on a screenshot that can be easily edited.From a logical standpoint BC is a reliable casino as i know and it is unlikely that they would risk their reputation for such actions. Beside that Im not sure if they have the capability to manipulate that system in that way just to make some players lose while they can set low returns instead of that and make it less suspicious.[1] : https://archive.is/
